data.author: Fabio Barbon

changelog.release_notes:
* fixed weekday bug on time zone
* preliminary time 2 support

° fixed regression on health rendering
° added option for "fixed width" health rendering (instead of relative to daily peak)
° fixed bug with settings
° fixed bug with sleep data visualization

° fixed bug on diorite preventing configuration changes
° added option to choose between heart data and steps data on diorite devices

* big battery efficiency improvement
* preliminary support for pebble 2

* added AM/PM, month/day and day/month complications
* added option to number hours 2-12/2-12 instead of 2-24
* added option to show battery level as background progressive fill or circular graph

* fix rendering when no detail health data available
* added "support my pebble development" link to configuration page
* added screen obstruction handling (smaller circle clock, no health data, complications are drawn)
* added "digital clock" complication

* added configuration (colors, complications, vibe on disconnect, midnight on top or bottom)
* added daily step goal progress (background color fill or circular graph)
* added battery level complication
* added phone disconnection icon

* more battery efficient and precise health sampling code
* removed useless info current month
MAJOR bug fix that crashed the watchface when refreshing health data after yesterday's sleep start
font fix

* fixed and improved health data refresh
* removed center digital clock
beta release

data.description:
Analog watchface showing the last 24 hours of activity and sleep time in a radial fashion that somehow resembles an eye iris. 

Highly configurable with complications and custom colors.

Available complications include battery level, moon phase and daily health goal.

Enjoy! 

Made with ♥ in Italy

latest_release.release_notes:
* fixed weekday bug on time zone
* preliminary time 2 support

data.title: IRIS 24

data.author: FC STUDIO

changelog.release_notes: Add support for DIORITE
UI adjustments to match Palm OS UI pixel by pixel
Update a custom font
Add 1 pixel to both left and right to simulate Palm device's border.
Shake to switch between clock and launcher
Initial release on July 21, 2016

data.description:
I bought a brand new palm m505 in July 2016 to complete my collections. It brings back a lot of old memories, so I decided to create a watchface most similar to the Palm OS, not a generated watchface. Maybe it is not really usable but good enough to show off. 

•	Shows OS4.1 color UI for Time Series and B&W for Pebbles
•	Identical battery status and charging status
•	Custom-built font for time, small but it is the same as Palm OS
•	Support both 12-hour and 24-hour
•	Shake to switch between clock and launcher
•	Show Bluetooth status as the launcher’s category. Display Palm.Net when connected, and No Link when disconnected 
•	Disconnection vibration, four long pulses
data.title: palm powered

Requires Pebble firmware 3:14 or later

data.description:
Hexagon-based analog watchface
- clear outer hexagon (with smaller hexagon in it) showing the hour
- the central hexagon shows "PM" from 12:00
- hand from the large central hexagon leads to the 5-minute value
- 4 hexagons either side of the central one clear to indicate additional minutes with optional number
- floating hand leads to the last 5-second value
- Bluetooth indicator
- Battery level indicator

Some people might prefer the 5-minute hand to be thicker, so that's configurable

The 5-second hand can be switched off to conserve battery

Color configuration for:
- Background
- Highlight (5-minute, inner hour, Bluetooth & battery)
- 5-second hand (if enabled)

Note that when Quick Views occur, the 0, 5, 30 & 35 numbers are squashed up against the hexagons until the Quick View is over.  This has been done to avoid reducing the size of the display (and the resulting reduction in visibility).


Screenshots:
(1)  3:34:45PM
(2)  2:42:10PM (no minute text)
(3)  6:00PM (no seconds) 
(4)  7:15:00PM (thick 5-min hand)
(5)  7:29:45PM (with Quick View)


Designed by Peter Fletcher, who has designed watches for Tokyoflash and a number of the faces I have published. The watchface is published with his permission.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views

data.author: Kiezel
data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

If you love our faces, give us a heart to let us know!

Modern Health was designed and built for simplicity and clarity. We focused on adding clear fonts but also giving your status of your daily step goal. The outer bar can be your battery or your progress towards your customized step goal. The step goal can be your daily average or a set amount (10k steps). You can also customize the fonts to be thick or thin. And of course with all Kiezel Faces, you can customize all the colors to your liking.


Enjoy!

Team Kiezel-
data.title: Modern Health

changelog.release_notes: Based on original "CLEAR" watchface.

data.description:
Based on the original "CLEAR" design, I've added two graphical indicators, with the same minimalistic concept in mind:
- one bar for the battery level.
- one bar for the day of the week, the segment position indicates the day, (like an analog watch hand does)
In addition to the other indicators:
- Battery %
- Bluetooth connection
- Time
- Day name
- Date

data.author: Jussi Kari

changelog.release_notes:
- Fixed flashing empty data rings on load
- Fixed showing bad data with quick view

v2.0
- Pebble 2 (Diorite) support
- Pebble Time 2 (Emery) support
- Major improvements to battery life
- New awesome weather icons
- Quick load (it was slow when returning from menu). / Time-consuming drawing of data rings delayed in first load
- Digital mode: Much requested bigger font
- Analog mode: Much better looking time pointers
- Network polling limited when e.g. provider is down
- Smaller and cleaner battery indicator - in par with importance
- Completely removed floating point arithmetics from code to get float libs removed and filesize down by another 2kB
- Fixed inconsistencies with bluetooth icon (show icon when active, show with red strikethrough when not)
- Fixed enabling StepVerse caused random crashes
- Fixed sending useless empty weather app messages when weather is disabled
- Fixed sometimes missing weather icon even when data is available
- Improved memory handling, moved things from stack to heap
- Renamed forecast.io to Dark Sky

- Improved performance, saving battery
- Sleep mode (stops battery consuming activities you don't need during sleep)
- More levels for activity, show very light movement too
- Improved circle UI. Always show full circle so that e.g. activity don't look like random spots
- Activity now has more colors showing more detailed and beautiful data
-BUGFIX:  Fixed corner rarely showing thin in bold mode (PT/PTS)
- Fixed quick view support

- StepVerse integration
- Fixed alignment of extra info
- Fixed daily step count sometimes not shown although enabled
- Further cleaned configuration
+ A simple fix to default to having all data rings enabled instead of none

- Optimized for new OS 4.0, supports timeline quick view
- You can now order data rings in any way you want
- Restructured and cleaned config page
- Redesigned sunrise and achievement pin icons for cleaner looks
- Even more pixel perfecting things

Features:
- Disable bluetooth vibration
- Improved battery UI; all dots colored according to current level for better readability + show empty dots
- Smart clear activity and sleep data at night when sleeping for no leftover activity markings from yesterday or old nap data. Start new day with new data.
- Merge weekday and day of month fields for better text alignment
- Weather data improvements
- Respect Pebble's 12h/24h setting when digital mode selected
Introduced digital style. Ability to buy watchface at any time. Fixed weather icon sometimes getting lost even if connectivity exists.

Instead of current steps per minute, you now have "extra info", for which you currently can choose steps per minute, total steps today or none. Also, on Round, extending outmost ring in bold mode all the way so you can't see blank behind bezel.
Fixed Weather Underground integration, fixed location of bluetooth disconnect icon, improved updating weather to not always reload data if it's fresh already.

New alternative bold style (enable in settings). You will love it. You can now customize the hand colors too. UI has also been refined a bit to be more balanced and to avoid any overlappings between the components in any circumstances. Some bugs have been squashed too, as per usual.

Fixed UI draw bug causing some lines not to be drawn correctly on rectangle display watches. Introduced loading step data from API - now one can see steps instantly when installing the app, instead of only new steps. Also real time data is supported by loading data periodically from API. You will not be left with empty activity periods after having watchface unloaded (e.g. hidden by another app).
Weather related fixes. Three weather providers now available instead of one. Go select your preferred provider and setup API key.
Dropped Aplite (original Pebble) support at least temporarily. It was unstable due to memory constraints.
Tweaked UI slightly to avoid overlapping elements. Moved weather icon and temperature up a few pixels and pins (sunrise/sunset/goal) a bit closer to edge
Removed background worker, moved code to UI. Will continue activity improvements in next update. This release also reduces both watchface size and memory footprint.
Load last 24 hours of sleep data when loading watchface for first time. Should give better first impression.
First release

data.description:
See more at: http://gethealthtime.com

Health Time is a watchface providing heavy health focused data - all while keeping the battery life in focus.

Features:
+ OS 4.0 optimized. Timeline quick view support.
+ Supports PT, PTR, P2 and PT2
+ Digital (12h/24h) or analog time
+ Weekday and day of month
+ Activity data (last 12 hours)
+ Daily step count
+ Current steps per minute during activity
+ Daily activity vs. your average
+ Show your average compared to friends' average (with StepVerse)
+ Daily goal pin shows when you beat the goal
+ Sleep data (last 24 hours)
+ Current weather icon
+ Current temperature (F/C)
+ Sunrise/sunset pins, 
+ Battery level
+ Bluetooth icon & vibe
+ Highly customizable

You have three days to try if you like the watchface. After that, you can choose to purchase it via Kiezelpay. Once you have purchased the watchface, it's yours to keep and you can use it on any Pebble and phone you desire, as long as you use the same Pebble account.

You can use it on your different watches with one purchase.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Fixed flashing empty data rings on load
- Fixed showing bad data with quick view

data.title: Health Time

data.description:
BETA VERSION - please send email if you try it & have issues or suggestions.

Based nearly entirely on John Costik's SIMPLE CGM SPARK watchface - all kudos to him, all blame to me. This version has an analog clock, lower profile CGM displays, and adds battery level and tap/flick to refresh CGM. 

View CGM data. 

This app is not supported or endorsed by Dexcom. 
Simple CGM MUST NOT BE USED TO MAKE MEDICAL DECISIONS. THERE IS NO WARRANTY FOR THE PROGRAM, TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW. EXCEPT WHEN OTHERWISE STATED IN WRITING THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND/OR OTHER PARTIES PROVIDE THE PROGRAM “AS IS” WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO THE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE OF THE PROGRAM IS WITH YOU. SHOULD THE PROGRAM PROVE DEFECTIVE, YOU ASSUME THE COST OF ALL NECESSARY SERVICING, REPAIR OR CORRECTION.

The watchface requires: Active use of G5 Mobile app or the Share receiver with the Dexcom Share2 iOS application sending data to their cloud service. OR active use of recent Nightscout version.

latest_release.release_notes: V0.7 - cleanup look, add tap/flick CGM data refresh, fix CGM update on classic/steel

data.title: Simple CGM TicToc

data.author: Horsetooth Software

changelog.release_notes: V1.9 - compatible with latest nightscout profile json (used for Pred display only)
V1.8 - fix for older nightscout 0.9beta3, but requires 8/30 or later dev branch site (still marked version 0.9beta3) for profile/prediction
V1.7 - swap bwpo for iob+cob based prediction, requires nightscout 0.9 beta3 or later and profile setup (uses 1st carb ratio and insulin sensitivity).
V1.6 - fix vibration for "old" alerts; add alert auto-snooze choices; disable for BG updates on tap; display of BWP & BWPO if enabled on nightscout site
V1.5 - add config. options to disable timeline pins, and disable vibration, add diorite/pebble2 support
V1.4 - apologies, the last release (V1.3) used a beta SDK, which watches aren't yet ready for - this one uses the proper SDK, with same updates from V1.3.
V1.3 - UI cleanup: differentiate warning colors from chosen colors; snooze-until-cancel option; show last bg with strikethrough instead of 'old', and bug fixes.
V1.2 - adjust day position on square pebbles
V1.1 - fix nightscout w/mmol
V1.0 - fix watch colors during "anc", add snooze display (z:<minutes>, if snoozed), changed snooze options to 30/60/90, and fix comm_alert/old-data vibes to also snooze
V0.8 - larger day font, trend arrow bug fix
V0.7 - add COB with Nightscout dev branch (compatible with nightscout 0.9.0-beta3); add complication coloring
V0.6 - add options to choose colors, hide BG, and second hand.
V0.5 - Add IOB display for Nightscout Careportal IOB-enabled sites
V0.4 - support Pebble Round
V0.3 - tap/flick to refresh CGM data
V0.2 - bug fixes, support classic/steel watches
V0.1 - this version fixes icon and delta time, and enables Timeline
V0.0 - beta release

data.description:
Please send email (through pebble store contact link) if you try it & have issues or suggestions.

Based nearly entirely on John Costik's SIMPLE CGM SPARK watchface - all kudos to him, all blame to me. This version has an analog clock, lower profile CGM displays, and adds battery level, tap or wrist flick to refresh CGM data, IOB display for Nightscout Careportal IOB-enabled sites (& COB for Nightscout 0.9.0-beta3+), color choice, and other options. 

View CGM data. 

This app is not supported or endorsed by Dexcom.

Simple CGM MUST NOT BE USED TO MAKE MEDICAL DECISIONS. THERE IS NO WARRANTY FOR THE PROGRAM, TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW. EXCEPT WHEN OTHERWISE STATED IN WRITING THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND/OR OTHER PARTIES PROVIDE THE PROGRAM “AS IS” WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO THE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE OF THE PROGRAM IS WITH YOU. SHOULD THE PROGRAM PROVE DEFECTIVE, YOU ASSUME THE COST OF ALL NECESSARY SERVICING, REPAIR OR CORRECTION.   

The watchface requires: Active use of G5 Mobile app or the Share receiver with the Dexcom Share2 iOS application sending data to their cloud service. OR active use of recent Nightscout version.

Color choices are from: https://developer.pebble.com/guides/tools-and-resources/color-picker/ (E.g., enter "DarkGreen" for GColorDarkGreen).

latest_release.release_notes: V1.9 - compatible with latest nightscout profile json (used for Pred display only)

data.author: jae

changelog.release_notes:
- REV 1.2 -
You can change the background color.
Background color can be selected blue, white, red, yellow, purple.

Background color is determined by the first letter of the time zone that was set before once.

B=Blue
G=Green
R=Red
M=Magenta
W=White
Y=Yellow  * default color.

please change the setting of the Timezone of Pebble time 2 time.

First time to determine the background color.
Second time is always of your time zone.

For example, if you select the America / Boston, the background color is blue.

REV 01.1 
- supported Chalk (Pebble Time Round).

data.description:

If you wish to Celsius display, please change the setting of the 24-hour display of Pebble time.

If you wish to reverse the above, Please use the YELLOWFACEf.

please change the setting of the Timezone of Pebble time 2 time.

5.1

Spring is here

Winter is here
Snow, Ice, Lights, new activities and animals for this new update :)

More winter variations to come.

A new Season Fall
Fire colored tree, pumkins, mushrooms and squirels comes to the little lake house, along with new scenes.

A new configuration menu lets you decide when season change : real time, evry day, or never.

data.description:
<< Same as Original Time Slide Map Sun View but added more density to smaller text when map is shown >>  

Same as Time Slide but on shake it shows day night map with sun at highest point on current line.   Again mainly doing this as a test so I have icon on my pebble app for screen.  Screen shot was from 12:10 pm local time which puts the sun just east of New York, due to local DST.  No configurations available. Just working on code and wanted a screen shot on my pebble. 

Thank you David Gianforte for original map code!

data.description:
Inspired by AOFACECLOCK1st by Akemori Oda

The same design with the following additions:

- New Colours every time the watchface is launched and every time the Day changes (was every minute)
- Added Weather updates 
- Updates every 25 minutes
- Use Current Location (GPS) or Fixed Location
- Vibrates when Bluetooth disconnects
- Displays the current Apparent Temperature
- Weather powered by Forecast.io (no API key required!)

data.description:
Do you feel stressed when looking at your watch? With this watchface this won't happen anymore. It shows the time using simple colors, one color displacing the other while the hour passes by.

If you really must, you can see the time briefly when you flick your wrist.

This watchface is based on the idea of application-studios Team's "Stressless Clock" app, to be found in the Google Play Store.

data.description:
Based nearly entirely on John Costik's SIMPLE CGM SPARK watchface - all kudos to him, all blame to me.  This version has a larger clock font, smaller spark line, and adds battery level and tap/wrist flick to refresh CGM data.

View CGM data.
 
 This app is not supported or endorsed by Dexcom.
 
 Simple CGM MUST NOT BE USED TO MAKE MEDICAL DECISIONS. THERE IS NO WARRANTY FOR THE PROGRAM, TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW. EXCEPT WHEN OTHERWISE STATED IN WRITING THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND/OR OTHER PARTIES PROVIDE THE PROGRAM “AS IS” WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO THE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE OF THE PROGRAM IS WITH YOU. SHOULD THE PROGRAM PROVE DEFECTIVE, YOU ASSUME THE COST OF ALL NECESSARY SERVICING, REPAIR OR CORRECTION. 
 
 The watchface requires:
 Active use of G5 Mobile app or the Share receiver with the Dexcom Share2 iOS application sending data to their cloud service.

data.description:
Cinkciarz.pl Pebble dedicated app, enables you to browse currency exchange rates quickly and comfortably. The exchange rate for the displayed currency pair is updated on demand (watchapp) or every three minutes, and the currencies change every five seconds (watchface). The apps turns to a lower activity mode between 9:00 PM and 7:00 AM. This means that the exchange rates are updated once every hour, and the displayed currency pair changes every minute. This increases the battery's life. The app is available for two platforms: Basalt (Pebble Time and Time Steel) and Chalk (Pebble Time Round).

Following features:
- Cinkciarz.pl exchange rates

No Companion App required.

data.author: Weston Dransfield

changelog.release_notes:
v1.5
Most of the new features in this release of Helium are customizations that can be accessed from the watchface settings page in the Pebble app.

New in Helium:
- Added battery meter (and ability to toggle it on or off via the watchface settings page).
- Option to swap the hour and minute rings (i.e. Show minute on the outermost ring and hour on the innermost ring). This can be done from the watchface settings page.
- Added Bluetooth disconnection warning to watch face.

Email any feedback or requests to pebble.wd@gmail.com
Initial release of Helium watchface for Pebble. Bug reports and pull requests are welcome.

data.description:
New in v1.5: battery meter, customize which ring shows the hour/minute, and a dropped connection notification!

Helium is a simple and appealing layered watchface. Helium’s outer ring indicates the hour, its middle ring indicates the minute, and its center displays the day of the month (this order can be configured via the settings page). 

Email any feedback or requests to pebble.wd@gmail.com

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.5
Most of the new features in this release of Helium are customizations that can be accessed from the watchface settings page in the Pebble app.

New in Helium:
- Added battery meter (and ability to toggle it on or off via the watchface settings page).
- Option to swap the hour and minute rings (i.e. Show minute on the outermost ring and hour on the innermost ring). This can be done from the watchface settings page.
- Added Bluetooth disconnection warning to watch face.

Email any feedback or requests to pebble.wd@gmail.com

data.author: Dr. David Brown

changelog.release_notes: Initial release.

data.description:
The Elder Sign watchface elements refer to the Cthulhu mythos. The main display shows the Elder Sign with the watch hands represented by a circle (seconds), triangle (minute) and square (hour).

Special features include:

* When the second hand (circle) coincides with the minute hand (triangle) the display changes to read "Cthulhu Fhtagan" (meaning "Cthulhu Dreams").

* When the second hand (circle) coincides with the hour hand (square) the display changes to show the Necronomicon sigil.

* When the second hand (circle), minute hand (triangle) and hour hand (square) coincide, the watch vibrates to notify the wearer that the "stars have aligned" (for this hour) and the display changes to show a depiction of Cthulhu until the minute changes.

The watchface also includes a bluetooth connectivity indicator, vibration on bluetooth disconnect and a battery level indicator.
data.title: Elder Sign

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.

changelog.release_notes: Same as "Floating Date" but designed to fill a rectangular screen.

data.description:
My "Floating Date Square" watchface is the same as my "Floating Date" watchface, but designed to fit a rectangular screen instead of a round one, good for the color Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel watches.
The date window now floats in a square path instead of in a circular path.

It shows date with the weekday in your current language (English and Spanish work fine, others should also do, please tell me if your language works fine).
Background is green if bluethooth is connected, red if not. 
It also vibrates if it loses or gains bluethooth connectivity.

latest_release.release_notes: Same as "Floating Date" but designed to fill a rectangular screen.

data.title: Floating Date Square

data.author: Zealotree

changelog.release_notes:
- Fixed a Bug where time did not redraw after a notification

- Fixed Sunrise  Colors
Initial Release

data.description:
-- TIME ROUND EXCLUSIVE --

It's Cirkular with Sunrise/Sunset indicators and in dark mode.


An analogue clock that displays the time and date based on the positions of the clock. Telling the time is as simple as looking at the outer ring

Outer Ring (12 circles) tells the current hour, minute, month, and today's sunrise/sunset clockwise. 

- Today's Sunrise and Sunset times are filled with Yellow and Orange respectively. It relies on the current location provided by your phone or from your fixed coordinates. 


- Hour 12/December (0), Hour 3/March (3), Hour 6/June (6), Hour 9/September (9) are marked with a black ring for visibility.

- The white circle displays the current hour's position. It also displays the minute on the same circle.

- The current month has a red outline.

Middle Ring (30 + 1 circles) is the month dial. 

- Days divisible by 5 are marked with a pink ring for visibility. 

- Day 30 is on the 12hr position.

- Day 31 is below Day 30. 

- The white circle displays today's date.



Inner Ring (7 circles) displays the week day. 
- Week starts on Sunday, on the 12hr position

- The white circle displays the current week day.


The Center AM/PM indicator, indicates the current AM/PM status. 
- Turns red/pink when it is a leap year.

Sample time and date in Screenshots:

1.  Thursday, December 1, 12:52 PM. Sunset Hour at 6pm.
2.  Friday, March 5, 4:52 AM. Sunrise Hour at 9am.
3.  Saturday, July 9, 3:56 PM. Sunset Hour at 4pm. (Leap Year).

latest_release.release_notes:
- Fixed a Bug where time did not redraw after a notification
- Added fixed location

data.title: Cirkular Helios

TTMMBRN is "you know his name"watchface. Date, time, steps and battery on your wrist. Pebble Master Key and Wunderground weather. Color presets, cutomize colors, hourly vibration, blue tooth disconnect notification and status.

TTMM watchfaces won Silver A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category, 2015 - 2016. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Elijah Kang and Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2016

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.
data.description:
I love round analog faces with a date window, but I hate those minutes when the hands cover part of the date precisely when I need to read it.

"Floating Date" solves this by moving this window to the center of the largest unused área. It actually moves every minute at half of the speed of the minute hand.

It shows date with the weekday in your current language (English and Spanish work fine, others should also do, please tell me if your language works fine) 
Background is green if bluethooth is connected, red if not. 
It also vibrates if it loses or gains bluethooth connectivity. 

See my "Floating Date Square" watchface for fitting non-round watches, like the Pebble Time, and Pebble Time Steel watches.
data.title: Floating Date

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.
data.description:
I love analog faces with a date window, but I hate those minutes when the hands cover part of the date precisely when I need to read it.
"Hands Behind" solves this by moving the hands <<behind>> this window, or better yet, think that this is not longer a window but a projection on your watch glass just <<above>> the hands!
It shows date with the weekday in your current language (English and Spanish work fine, others should also do, please tell me if your language works fine) 
Background is green if bluethooth is connected, red if not. 
It also vibrates if it loses or gains bluethooth connectivity.
data.title: Hands Behind

Outer Ring (12 circles) tells the current hour, minute, and month clockwise. 

- Hour 12/December (0), Hour 3/March (3), Hour 6/June (6), Hour 9/September (9) are marked with a black ring for visibility.
- The black circle displays the current hour's position. It also displays the minute on the same circle.

Middle Ring (30 + 1 circles) is the month dial.

Initial release.

data.description:
A Go/Igo/Weiqi/Baduk-inspired watchface for the Pebble Time that plays through the famous Game of the Century in 1934 (Honinbo Shusai vs. Go Seigen), which lasted over three months.

On this watchface, the game lasts 24 hours with the game progressing roughly every half an hour (by 6 moves).
data.title: Time to Go

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views
Requires Pebble firmware 3.13 or later.

data.description:
Watchface using "hands" to show time movement across 3 windows in 12/5/9 format, meaning: 12 hours (top), 5 10-minutes (left) and 9 single minutes (right).

The center window can optionally be used to show seconds.

There is a choice of 6 background colors.

Animation shows 7:47:00 in the 6 color choices.  The following image shows 9:28 (no seconds).

Designed by Peter Fletcher, who has designed watches for Tokyoflash and a number of the faces I have published. The watchface is published with his permission.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views

data.title: Trifocal

data.author: machineboy

changelog.release_notes:
v1.5

- Fixes some weather bugs, now shows minus degrees (brrrrrrrrrrrr!)

v1.4

- Now supports Weather Underground! You can choose either Openweathermap or Weather Underground as your weather provider (free API key required). Pick the one who gives you the most accurate weather.
- Customize background ring colour!
- More accurate weather icons for partly cloudy/scattered clouds.
- Wind direction bug fix.
- Minor tweaks.

Remember to go to the Watchful Settings on your phone to set up the watch face properly, and hit Save at the bottom when you're done. Going to the timeline and back often fixes missing weather or other settings.

v1.3

Pebble Round support! Hope you round folks like it :)

- Better bluetooth disconnection alert, now a red circle appears inside the rings.
- Option to remove leading zero on time (8:00 instead of 08:00)
- Various bug fixes

v1.2

- Experimental Original Pebble support.

v1.1

- Bug fix: Settings not displayed properly.

v1.0

Watchful is a clean, elegant and classy watch face with everything you need just a glance away. Keep track of your step goal and battery, get easy to read weather from openweathermap.org and get notified if you leave your phone behind. 

Designed to be super-visible and easy to read, whether you're jogging or running late for a meeting.

data.description:
Watchful is a beautiful, clean and elegant watch face with everything you need just a glance away.  

- Get in shape! Set a step goal and see the outer circle grow as you go! 
- Easy to see battery ring warns you when battery is at 20% 
- Temperature, conditions and wind direction/strength powered by wunderground.com or openweathermap.org (API key needed) 
- Configurable date view 
- Shake to see battery and step details 
- Optional bluetooth disconnection alert 
- User-configurable colours 
- Easy to read, elegant time display (hey - it's still a watch!)

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.5

- Fixes some weather bugs, now shows minus degrees (brrrrrrrrrrrr!)

data.title: Watchful

data.author: Manel Torrecilla

data.description:
Habitual is a simple and smart-looking watchface that aims to help you pick up habits.

Use the Pebble app to enter up to five lines of custom text, reminding yourself to drink water, to continue working on that novel, to learn French and so on. Habitual will rotate between your custom reminders every 5 minutes.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added shake-for-battery-level
- Now available on Pebble 2 devices

data.title: Habitual

data.author: PNL Design

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2
Created from original and compiled for AppLite as well

data.description:
A regulator is a watch where hour and minute hands have separate dials, so they never overlap. The top dial shows the hours and the lower dial the minutes. Fully color configurable. BT connection warning (color of date/day changes on BT lost) with configurable vibration. Large battery load indicator in the left arch. Optional second hand. Two hand styles to pick from.
Supports English, Dutch, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Swedish, Norwegian and Finnish.
This is a paid watchface, $1.99 with a free 2 day trial period. 
Tip: When changing colors, begin with a dark background. When you get the hang of it you can make it as beautyful (or ugly) as you wish.
data.title: Regulator

data.author: JErickson

Happy 4th of July!! Have fun showing your patriotism!

Displays time and date.

changelog.release_notes:
- September is now shortened
- Added rain check warning
- Added the option to display today's steps at the bottom line
Clean up and improvements
- Fixed key issue
- Fixed Sunrise/Sunset colours
- Day dots fixed
- Fixed Day dots

- Added Day of Week Markers
- Made markers more visible
- Sunrise and Sunset indicators are now more visible

- Added Internationalization support!
- Various bug fixes
- Stable here

- Bug Fixes
- Improved Configuration page

- Added 24 Hour Analog
- Added Sunrise and Sunset Indicators

- Added fixed location
- Added option to vibrate on new data

data.description:
An office worker by day; an urban warrior by night.

Features:
- Offline Configuration via Clay
- Current Temperature for Current location
- Optional Fixed Location Coordinates
- Rain Check: detect chance of rain for the hour is 50% or greater
- Week day is in analogue mode. First dot filled is Sunday (red).
- 12hr Format: Shows AM/PM
- 24hr Format: Shows Week Number and Day of Year
- Show Today's Steps
- 24-Hour Analogue 
- Sunrise and Sunset markers (Yellow  is Sunrise; Orange is Sunset)
- Battery Ring
  - 100%-60%: Black
  - 50%: Yellow
  - 40-30%: Maroon
  - less than or equal to 20%: Red
- Bluetooth Indicator
  - Vibrate on Reconnect and Disconnect
  - Background Colour turns white when Disconnected
- Languages Supported: English, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Deutsch.  

NOTE: The watchface updates once per minute. Please wait up to 1-2 minutes for the weather to appear. 

NOTE: Language depends on your system defaults.

latest_release.release_notes:
- September is now shortened
- Added rain check warning

data.title: Zee's Watch

data.author: Zealotree

changelog.release_notes:
- Internationalization support
- BT indicator
- Light interaction disabled

- Change font
- FIxed AM/PM indicator

data.description:
Z Sleep

Even the most zealous people need rest. So does your pebble. 

It preserves the battery life by only displaying and updating the time when the pebble is flicked.

Features:
- Shake to Update 
- Great on Battery Life
- Shows Clouds when connected
- Battery Ring
  - 100%-60%: Green
  - 50%: Yellow
  - 40-30%: Maroon
  - less than 20%: Red
data.title: Z Sleep

v1.13 - **By request** Enable/Disable vibration when BT disconnected

v1.12

- Replaced duplicate @ logo with a Star logo
v1.11 - Fixed text loss after returning from notification.

data.description:
<< Map always in background, Large hour time slide on top no slide on bottom just actual day, date, month >>

Same as Time Slide but with map always showing sun at highest point on current line.  

Again mainly doing this as a test so I have icon on my pebble app for screen.

Screen shot was from 12:12 am local time which puts the sun just east of New York, due to local DST.

No configurations available. Just working on code and wanted a screen shot on my pebble. Thank you David Gianforte for original map code!

latest_release.release_notes: slight change to bottom date position
